name: part_009
file: tmp_【HOPE TO THE FUTURE 3D LIVE】 IRyS 2024 Birthday Live! #IRySBDay [cc5SQqswwMM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: IRyS introduces her 2024 Birthday Merch lineup, explaining the sci-fi and gamer theme that matches her live concert outfit.
Detailed look at the 'Hope To The Future' DeskMatRyS, featuring art by Piske.
Presentation of 'The Gamer JacketRyS', a real-life version of her in-game jacket in a wearable black color.
Introduction of 'The GuyRyS Cap', a white cap with the GuyRyS logo to match the jacket.
Explanation of the 'Complete Set Purchase Bonus', including limited edition hand-signed postcards.

subtitles.original:
Birthday Celebration 2024
Birthday Merch Complete Set
subtitles.english:
Birthday Celebration 2024
Birthday Merch Complete Set

subtitles.original: Merch!
subtitles.english: Merch!

subtitles.original: I will be releasing my birthday merch this year!
subtitles.english: I will be releasing my birthday merch this year!

subtitles.original: As you can see, it is sci-fi themed just like the live! Yay!
subtitles.english: As you can see, it is sci-fi themed just like the live! Yay!

subtitles.original: In with IRyS in her gamer uniform outfit in space!
subtitles.english: In with IRyS in her gamer uniform outfit in space!

subtitles.original: Yay! Isn't it pretty? It's from Piske-sensei! Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay! Isn't it pretty? It's from Piske-sensei! Yay!

subtitles.original: 今回はね、今回のライブに合わせてSFテーマのイラストになっています。
subtitles.english: This time, to match the live, it's a sci-fi themed illustration.

subtitles.original: では、詳細いきましょうか。Now let's go to the details! Yay!
subtitles.english: Now let's go to the details! Yay!

subtitles.original:
"Hope To The Future" DeskMatRyS
(Large Rubber Mat)
subtitles.english:
"Hope To The Future" DeskMatRyS
(Large Rubber Mat)

subtitles.original: First off, we have the "Hope To The Future" DeskMatRyS! Yay!
subtitles.english: First off, we have the "Hope To The Future" DeskMatRyS! Yay!

subtitles.original: えっと、ラバーマット、ワイドデスクマットになっています。
subtitles.english: Um, it's a rubber mat, a wide desk mat.

subtitles.original: From the same art from Piske-sensei!
subtitles.english: From the same art from Piske-sensei!

subtitles.original: It is slightly larger or wider than my past birthday mat that I released a couple years ago.
subtitles.english: It is slightly larger or wider than my past birthday mat that I released a couple years ago.

subtitles.original: So I think you'll definitely have a need for that. It is going to look very nice on your desk.
subtitles.english: So I think you'll definitely have a need for that. It is going to look very nice on your desk.

subtitles.original: Yes, I highly recommend you get it.
subtitles.english: Yes, I highly recommend you get it.

subtitles.original: 今回のデスクマットはね、何年か前の誕生日にリリースしたデスクマットよりちょいと長くなっています。
subtitles.english: This desk mat is a bit longer than the desk mat I released for my birthday a few years ago.

subtitles.original: なので是非々々デスクに広げていただけると、多分このイラストとてもデスクの上で映えると思うんで是非ゲットしてください。
subtitles.english: So please, please spread it out on your desk; I think this illustration will look great on your desk so please get it.

subtitles.original: 今回のイラスト自体はね、本当にSFなのでパソコン周りとか全然似合うんじゃないかなと思います。
subtitles.english: The illustration itself is really sci-fi, so I think it'll look great around your PC and such.

subtitles.original: Alrighty then, next merch. 次いきましょう。
subtitles.english: Alrighty then, next merch. Let's move on.

subtitles.original:
The Gamer JacketRyS
(Jacket)
subtitles.english:
The Gamer JacketRyS
(Jacket)

subtitles.original: The Gamer JacketRyS! Yay! The hypothetical jacket is no longer hypothetical! Yay!
subtitles.english: The Gamer JacketRyS! Yay! The hypothetical jacket is no longer hypothetical! Yay!

subtitles.original: えっと、今回の衣装じゃない、ゲーマー衣装の再現のジャケットになっています！
subtitles.english: Um, it's a jacket that's a reproduction of my gamer outfit!

subtitles.original: えっと、今回はね再現と言っても色違いになっています。みんなが使いやすいような黒にさせていただきました。
subtitles.english: Um, even though it's a reproduction, this time it's in a different color. I chose black so it's easier for everyone to use.

subtitles.original: でもデザイン自体はお揃いのデザインになっています。
subtitles.english: But the design itself is a matching design.

subtitles.original: 多分とってもかっこいいので、是非ゲットしてください。
subtitles.english: I think it's very cool, so please get it.

subtitles.original: And as I mentioned before, I think maybe in a past stream that I wanted to release a jacket, matching jacket. Yay!
subtitles.english: And as I mentioned before, I think maybe in a past stream that I wanted to release a jacket, matching jacket. Yay!

subtitles.original: It is in a different color, it is in black so that it'll be easier for all of you guys to wear.
subtitles.english: It is in a different color, it is in black so that it'll be easier for all of you guys to wear.

subtitles.original: But the design is going to be matching with my gamer outfit, so I think it'd be nice to be matching. Yay!
subtitles.english: But the design is going to be matching with my gamer outfit, so I think it'd be nice to be matching. Yay!

subtitles.original: Please do get it, let's match together. Yeah.
subtitles.english: Please do get it, let's match together. Yeah.

subtitles.original: 今回のね、お揃いなので、是非アイリスとお揃いにしよう。お揃いにしよう。
subtitles.english: It's matching this time, so let's match with IRyS. Let's match.

subtitles.original: 是非購入お願いします。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Please consider purchasing it. Thank you.

subtitles.original: Alright, and then next up, we have more clothes. まだお洋服系のグッズありますよ。
subtitles.english: Alright, and then next up, we have more clothes. There's still more clothes-type merch.

subtitles.original: The GuyRyS Cap
subtitles.english: The GuyRyS Cap

subtitles.original: We have the GuyRyS Cap! Woo!
subtitles.english: We have the GuyRyS Cap! Woo!

subtitles.original: Finally! I'm sure a lot of you guys wanted a GuyRyS cap for the longest time, ever since GuyRyS came to existence.
subtitles.english: Finally! I'm sure a lot of you guys wanted a GuyRyS cap for the longest time, ever since GuyRyS came to existence.

subtitles.original: It is a white cap with the GuyRyS logo on it!
subtitles.english: It is a white cap with the GuyRyS logo on it!

subtitles.original: Yes, it has your face on it, and it is white because, you know, GuyRyS' cap has to be white.
subtitles.english: Yes, it has your face on it, and it is white because, you know, GuyRyS' cap has to be white.

subtitles.original: It is going to look amazing with the jacket, so I think it'd be best to buy it as a set. Yes.
subtitles.english: It is going to look amazing with the jacket, so I think it'd be best to buy it as a set. Yes.

subtitles.original: Please do get it. If you are an Aristocrat, you need the GuyRyS cap. Buy it! Buy it now! Yay!
subtitles.english: Please do get it. If you are an Aristocrat, you need the GuyRyS cap. Buy it! Buy it now! Yay!

subtitles.original: 今回のね、アイリスのファン層のガイリスの帽子になっています。帽子を再現しました。
subtitles.english: This is a cap for the GuyRyS, IRyS' fan base. I've reproduced the cap.

subtitles.original: 帽子はね、ガイリスのキャラクターでも白い帽子被ってるんで、その白い帽子になっています。
subtitles.english: As for the cap, since the GuyRyS character wears a white cap, it's that white cap.

subtitles.original: それでガイリスの顔が写ってる帽子になっています。
subtitles.english: It's a cap with GuyRyS' face on it.

subtitles.original: あのね、ガイリス、アイリスのリスナーさんだったらこの帽子被んないとダメでしょ！
subtitles.english: You know, if you're a GuyRyS, a listener of IRyS, you have to wear this cap!

subtitles.original: 購入してちょ！
subtitles.english: Please buy it!

subtitles.original: あとジャケットと、黒いジャケットと多分いい色のコントラストになると思うんで、是非一緒に買って一緒に着装してください。
subtitles.english: Also, I think it'll make a nice color contrast with the black jacket, so please buy them together and wear them together.

subtitles.original: Complete Set Purchase Bonus
subtitles.english: Complete Set Purchase Bonus

subtitles.original: If you buy the full set, we will have a bonus postcard! Yay!
subtitles.english: If you buy the full set, we will have a bonus postcard! Yay!

subtitles.original: As for the postcards this time, there will be a limited edition set...
subtitles.english: As for the postcards this time, there will be a limited edition set...

subtitles.original: And of course, if you can't get the limited edition set, there will be of course a normal set bonus as well, so no worries.
subtitles.english: And of course, if you can't get the limited edition set, there will be of course a normal set bonus as well, so no worries.

subtitles.original: For the limited edition set, there will be the postcard with the IRyS hand-sign, hand-signed, I will sign them one by one.
subtitles.english: For the limited edition set, there will be the postcard with the IRyS hand-sign, hand-signed, I will sign them one by one.

subtitles.original: Postcards! Yay! So if you want the hand-signed postcard, please do hurry and get it.
subtitles.english: Postcards! Yay! So if you want the hand-signed postcard, please do hurry and get it.

subtitles.original: Yay! Buy it, buy it now! Yay!
subtitles.english: Yay! Buy it, buy it now! Yay!

subtitles.original: And if you perhaps do not make it for the limited edition set, no worries, there's still the normal stamped IRyS postcard with the signature.
subtitles.english: And if you perhaps do not make it for the limited edition set, no worries, there's still the normal stamped IRyS postcard with the signature.
